doc.title: Ladrones a domicilio
doc.plot: Bruno is a father of two girls and a professor at a private university. His main goal in life is work honestly and provide what his family needs. Sandra, his oldest daughter is about to finish high school and both she and her father have the hope of obtaining a scholarship in a prestigious private university. The life of Bruno starts darkening when he is informed in the very university in which he works that the scholarship programs have been suspended. Daily he faces the lack of discipline and respect of his students, mainly from Rogelio, the son of a rich family who doesn't seem to value him. With the help of his godparent he takes a second job as the driver of a values transport company. In his first day he meets a convict, just released from prison, that goes with them. The three men are used as guinea pigs by Octavio -a high executive officer in the company- to conduct an auto theft. But they are cunning, and Bruno's driving skills helps them to escape Octavio's plans. Desperate by the situation, they need to find a solution. Helped by Don Manuel, Bruno's father, they manage to negotiate their way out of the problem. After a very long night, Bruno will have the possibility to pay for the studies of his daughter.
